eas_text: A CIVIL AUTHORITY HAS ISSUED A FIRE WARNING FOR THE FOLLOWING COUNTIES/AREAS: Chelan, WA; AT 10:08 PM ON SEP 25, 2025 EFFECTIVE UNTIL 12:08 AM SEP 26, 2025. MESSAGE FROM WSLF/CAP.
extra_text:
Chelan County Sheriff WILDFIRE WARNING, Level 2 Evacuation Advisory in Upper Sunnyslope. The affected area is West Mountain Brook and Avalon Lane, East Mountain Brook, Pheasant Canyon Court, Burch Hollow Lane, and Lone Ram Lane. Roads and evacuation routes can become blocked. If you do not leave now, you could be trapped, injured, or killed. For updates check Local Radio, TV or the Chelan County Emergency Management Website and Facebook.
Repeat.
Chelan County Sheriff WILDFIRE WARNING, Level 2 Evacuation Advisory in Upper Sunnyslope. The affected area is West Mountain Brook and Avalon Lane, East Mountain Brook, Pheasant Canyon Court, Burch Hollow Lane, and Lone Ram Lane. Roads and evacuation routes can become blocked. If you do not leave now, you could be trapped, injured, or killed. For updates check Local Radio, TV or the Chelan County Emergency Management Website and Facebook. Please monitor local radio stations and Chelan County Emergency Management Facebook for updates.
